description:
When running jakarta-tomcat-5.0.27.exe, the installer looks for j2re instead of 
j2sdk and the environment is not setup correctly.  Because of this, Tomcat 
cannot find Javac to compile JSP files, which means JSP web pages cannot run.  
No matter how you setup the environment manually, it still does not work.
